heading: Motivation for the book
text: handbook current future MBAn students understand program works, targeted jobs , prepare recruiting processes. handbook first begin overview MBAn program, describing different resources available Ross experience, classes may take, skills gained . Following introduction, transition main section book, detailing career outcomes available MBAn students, driven research school’s Business Analytics program, CDO resources, experiences former Master Management students moved onto careers. introduce techniques going career exploration independently utilizing guide. Next chapter focusing overall recruiting process discussed careers MBAn students can prepare plan networking, applications, interviews. accumulate best practices resumes, cover letters, interviews. final section included detailing supportive resources challenges international students face searching careers U.S. globally, including dynamic list companies offer sponsorship. recognize research resources team able provide next weeks non-exhaustive, hope handbook baseline future students program can live updated future Master Business Analytics Graduates enter workforce find success careers.

heading: 1.1 Amey Bhile
text:
Hey , MBAn folk !! ’m Amey
born brought India, also completed Bachelor Engineering Computer Science, worked technology consultant three years. time Deloitte, realized interests lie interface technology business; needed expand skills knowledge domains, decided join Ross Business School.  
wish leverage data apply ML/analytical frameworks derive actionable insights create value. enjoy operating far outside comfort zone believe power incremental improvements.
Feel free reach ; always happy help :)“Data just summaries thousands stories - tell world, data analyst.”

heading: 1.2 Eunguy Lee
text:
Hello everyone! Eunguy.
born 1996 grew South Korea. went Michigan State University studied Supply Chain Management. junior year college, went back South Korea serve military operations sergeant two years. military experience, finished bechelor degree online courses MSU pandemic. Meanwhile, felt need capability handling data applied graduate school Business Analytics major.point Ross, exciting build network equip useful tools, Python, R, SQL. business person, used computer skills. However, someone said “pain doesn’t kill make stronger.” believe putting time effort next 10 months develop ability business analyst. hope career handbook brings insights .

Boston destination due attractiveness snow. spent three years Boston moved Ann Arbor graduate study. People hate long winter , looking forward !

heading: 3.4 Long-Term Gains
4.1 Footnotes
text: Footnotes put inside square brackets caret ^[]. Like one 1.

heading: 4.2 Citations
text:
Reference items bibliography file(s) using @key.example, using bookdown package2 (check last code chunk index.Rmd see citation key added) sample book, built top R Markdown knitr3 (citation added manually external file book.bib).
Note .bib files need listed index.Rmd YAML bibliography key.bs4_book theme makes footnotes appear inline click . example book, added csl: chicago-fullnote-bibliography.csl index.Rmd YAML, include .csl file. download new style, recommend: https://www.zotero.org/styles/RStudio Visual Markdown Editor can also make easier insert citations: https://rstudio.github.io/visual-markdown-editing/#/citations

heading: 5.1 Equations
5.2 Theorems and proofs
text:
Labeled theorems can referenced text using \@ref(thm:tri), example, check smart theorem 5.1.Theorem 5.1  right triangle, \(c\) denotes length hypotenuse
\(\) \(b\) denote lengths two sides, 
\[^2 + b^2 = c^2\]Read https://bookdown.org/yihui/bookdown/markdown-extensions--bookdown.html.

heading: 5.3 Callout blocks
text: bs4_book theme also includes special callout blocks, like .rmdnote.can use markdown inside block.user define appearance blocks LaTeX output.may also use: .rmdcaution, .rmdimportant, .rmdtip, .rmdwarning block name.R Markdown Cookbook provides help use custom blocks design callouts: https://bookdown.org/yihui/rmarkdown-cookbook/custom-blocks.html

heading: Hello bookdown

heading: 5.4 A section
text: chapter sections start second-level (##) higher heading followed section title, like sections . can many want within chapter.

heading: An unnumbered section
text: Chapters sections numbered default. un-number heading, add {.unnumbered} shorter {-} end heading, like section.
